elements.description: Something that keeps me from working with my health.
elements.comments: As long as any card with this aspect exists, it will not be possible to perform the manual labor jobs.

elements.description: Something that keeps me from working with my passion.
elements.comments: As long as any card with this aspect exists, it will not be possible to perform the painting jobs.

elements.description: Something that keeps me from working with my reason.
elements.comments: As long as any card with this aspect exists, it will not be possible to find the Glover and Glover job. If you have a mod like The Author installed, authoring shouldn't be allowed, either.

elements.description: Something that keeps me from working with my abilities.
elements.comments: As long as any card with this aspect exists, it will not be possible to perform unskilled jobs (including finding Glover and Glover).

elements.description: Something that keeps me from working with my skills.
elements.comments: As long as any card with this aspect exists, it will not be possible to perform the skilled-labor jobs. (superjw2, that means no authoring, either!)

elements.description: Something that keeps me from working with my reason.
elements.comments: As long as any card with this aspect exists, it will not be possible to find the Glover and Glover job.

elements.description: Something that keeps me from begging in the streets.
elements.comments: As long as any card with this aspect exists, it will not be possible to beg with decrepitude.
